name: Cresta Addons for Elementor
author: CrestaProject - Rizzo Andrea

sections.description:
Cresta Addons for Elementor adds many useful Elementor widgets to your website.
These widgets will allow you to add new elements to your web pages quickly and easily with a style never seen before.

Elementor page builder is required for this plugin.

10+ FREE ELEMENTOR WIDGETS

We have designed dozens of Widgets that improve the Elementor Page Builder experience, try them now:
1. Advanced Heading – Create beautiful headers with dual color titles
2. Alert Message – Show an alert to your users
3. Business Hours – Show your users the opening hours of your business
4. Double Buttons – One button is not enough, two is better!
5. Flip Box – Use animated flip boxes to make any content stand out
6. Heading Typewriter – Add animated headers with a typewriter effect
7. Image Scroll – Show images inside a box where the user can scroll inside
8. News Ticker – A small and beautiful box where you can display your latest posts
9. Posts Box – A grid where you can show your posts in a pleasant way
10. Quote – Cite the best authors with a touch of style

Many other elements on PRO Version

  1. Ajax Search – Allow your users to search your site and show results without reloading the page
  2. Content Behind Background – Show a title or image with a nice animation only when the user scrolls
  3. Content Timeline – Show your posts, custom posts or custom blocks with a timeline
  4. Filterable Gallery – Create beautiful image galleries that can be filtered by users
  5. Image Compare – Make your users see the difference between two images
  6. Image Hotspots – Add icons, text, and tooltips to images to highlight some aspect of them
  7. Offcanvas – Use a button to show offcanvas content to your users
  8. OnePage Navigation – A beautiful vertical menu that allows your users to navigate between sections of a page
  9. Page Scroll Progress – It shows a bar that fills up as the user scrolls
  10. Posts Carousel – A pleasant carousel to show your posts or custom posts
  11. Price List – Easily create a menu with prices, images and text
  12. Pricing Table – Super customizable pricing table, nothing more to say
  13. Scroll to next section – A simple animated icon to allow your users to move on to the next section
  14. Step by Step – Great for creating sections where you explain the steps to follow
  15. Stylize Every Word – Create beautiful and imaginative titles by stylizing every single word
  16. Switch – Show your users a switch button to view 2 different content
  17. Tilt Effect – Beautiful tilt effect to apply on titles, texts and images

If you have any technical questions about the plugin, you can consult the documentation

Credits & Copyright

Typed.js, Copyright 2014 Matt Bold

Licenses: MIT
Source: https://github.com/mattboldt/typed.js
sections.installation:
1. Unzip cresta-addons-for-elementor.zip
  2. Upload the folder ‘cresta-addons-for-elementor’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard
  4. Go to your WordPress Dashboard under “Main Menu -> Cresta Addons” to set the options
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since itâ€™s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

If Elementor works, then Cresta Addons plugin works too ðŸ™‚

What if I update to PRO version?

You will be able to use all Cresta Addons widgets. You will not lose any existing elements/content.
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 6.2

1.0.8

  • Improved compatibility with Elementor

1.0.7

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 6.0

1.0.6

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 5.9
  • Fixed News Ticker widget to work with the latest version of Elementor

1.0.5

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 5.8

1.0.4

  • Fixed some deprecations for Elementor widgets

1.0.3

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 5.7

1.0.2

  • Added compatibility with WordPress 5.6

1.0.1

  • Fixed Heading Typewriter addon

1.0.0

  • Initial release
